events.title: Deepfake Election Law
events.summary: Restricts distribution of deceptive deepfake videos close to elections.

events.title: Automated Decision Tools Accountability Act (Proposed)
events.summary: Would regulate high-risk automated decision systems for employment, housing, and credit.

events.title: Oregon Consumer Privacy Act (SB 619)
events.summary: Establishes comprehensive consumer data rights, including the right to opt-out of profiling and automated decision-making.

events.title: Artificial Intelligence Task Force (HB 4153)
events.summary: Creates a task force to study AI terms and definitions for potential future legislation, reporting findings by late 2024.

events.title: Campaign Finance and Deepfake Disclosure (SB 1571)
events.summary: Requires disclosure of the use of AI or other synthetic media in campaign advertisements to prevent voter deception.

events.title: Unlawful Dissemination of Intimate Images (HB 2299)
events.summary: Criminalizes the dissemination of AI-generated intimate images (deepfake pornography) by including digitally created or manipulated depictions in the definition of intimate images.

events.title: Facial Recognition Law (SB 6280)
events.summary: First state law regulating government use of facial recognition technology, requiring accountability reports and meaningful human review.

events.title: Artificial Intelligence Task Force (ESSB 5838)
events.summary: Establishes an Artificial Intelligence Task Force to assess current uses and trends of AI in state government and the private sector, and to make recommendations to the Legislature.

events.title: Prohibition of Forged Digital Likeness (HB 1205)
events.summary: Criminalizes the knowing distribution of a forged digital likeness (deepfake) to defraud, harass, threaten, or intimidate another person.

events.title: Deepfake Revenge Porn Criminalization
events.summary: Made malicious deepfake pornography illegal.

events.title: AI Task Force Bill
events.summary: Would establish a statewide task force to study AI's impact on government.

events.title: Employee Monitoring Disclosure Law
events.summary: Requires employers to disclose electronic monitoring tools, including automated systems.

events.title: Automated Employment Decision Tool Restrictions
events.summary: Proposal to regulate AI hiring tools and require bias auditing.

events.title: AI in Education Guidelines
events.summary: Proposal to study use of AI tools in public schools and establish usage guidelines.

events.title: AI Video Interview Act
events.summary: Restricts AI analysis of job-interview videos, requiring consent and transparency.

events.title: Biometric Information Privacy Act Enforcement Expansion
events.summary: Proposed expansion of AI/biometric privacy enforcement.

events.title: Privacy Act (CPA)
events.summary: Includes provisions about automated profiling and data processing transparency.

events.title: AI-Specific Amendments
events.summary: Proposed amendments for explicit AI/ADS requirements.

events.title: Facial Recognition Moratorium (Local, Cities)
events.summary: Several municipalities passed restrictions on government facial recognition use.

events.title: Statewide AI Oversight Bill
events.summary: Proposal for an AI oversight committee and ADS transparency requirements.

events.title: AI in Education Guidelines
events.summary: Proposal to study use of AI tools in public schools and establish usage guidelines.
